title: Content w/sub folders of DRAFT Folder complete disappeared after a "Sleep" timeout
content:
Is there anyway I can recover the content of the Folder and Sub Folders???

I'm 80 years old - VN was easier - there should be a law banning anyone over the age of 75 from owning, possessing or using a Smart Phone, I Pad, Kindle or Computer. I want to return to two tin cans and a string!!! ESSAYSON
creator: eltonringsak

title: cannot access my email
content: I have been having a hard time accessing my email account, it just twirls, when i try to shut down, i have to force quit Thunderbird - ive done that about 4 times in the last 20 hours - the INBOX looks super funky- i cant find the tag button - i am wondering if there was an upgrade that really did not upgrade for me 0
creator: kayakcon

title: Using a S/MIME Certificate from Thunderbird with K9 Mail
content:
Hi,

Tl;dr: how to convert pgp public keys to a csr and vice versa for the generated Certificate

Since K9 and Thunderbird are about to merge I wanted to point out here that i have difficulties using a S/MIME Certificate in the PKDS 12 format on my phone. The OpenKeychain app required just can't import it. I need to use a Certificate that got signed by my company. So even if I generate a PGP pubkic key with open keychain I don't get how i would turn that into a CSR that I could send to the it Department. Has anyone else had the same issue?
creator: gaaartner
